ref.mixed-citation:
Levy, A. and
Czosnek, H. ( 2003) The DNA‐B of the non‐phloem‐limited Bean dwarf mosaic virus (BDMV) is able to move the phloem‐limited Abutilon mosaic virus (AbMV) out of the phloem, but DNA‐B of AbMV is unable to confine BDMV to the phloem . Plant Molecular Biology, 53, 789– 803. 15082926
